"The Reverend Mr. Black" is a 1963 song by Billy Edd Wheeler, Mike Stoller, and 
Jerry Leiber. The chorus came from the 1931 folk song, "The Lonesome Valley," 
a version of which appears in the 2000 film, O Brother, Where Art Thou?. It was 
recorded by The Kingston Trio in 1963 and became a top-ten hit for...
